name: Seven Games in Seven Weeks
description:
Enjoy seven games in one with this compilation. Whether you like saving baby birds, protecting small flowers, or just looking for creatures' rare color variants, this collection has something for everyone to enjoy:

In Up (X) Creek, you can help a small, poop-y hermit crab avoid deadly, green water.

In A Force To Be Reckoned With, you can play as Sir Isaac Newton and defend yourself from an oppressive monarch who's trying to un-invent gravity.

In Shiny Hunt Simulator, you can hunt rare, specially-colored variants of creatures, and then view a database cataloging all of your catches.

In Everything's Coming Up Roses, you can protect yourself and two other roses from swarms of hungry mosquitos.

In Whinr, you can experience a dating app with a very unusual twist.

In Ravenous Dashchunds Try to Eat Birds While the Music From The Battleship Potemkin Plays, you can bounce small birds to safety, saving them from the gnashing jaws of a wiener dog hoard.

And in Accounting, you can cross-reference various books and guidelines in order to determine which branch of the afterlife various humans will be sent to.

Seven Games In Seven Weeks was made for my challenging and amazing Game Lab class, but contains all the effort and care that I put into my other games. So whether you're a fan of crabs, gravity, or judgement, there's surely something to enjoy with this compilation.
